com.trefis.partitioner.resource

Class Partition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.trefis.partitioner.resource.Partition

  • @Path(value="partition")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public class Partition
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest service that allows for a list of numbers to be partitioned into smaller subsets based on a max sum. This is a generic service that currently support multiple partitioning algorithms Root resource (exposed at "partition" path)

      Partition()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response partition(java.lang.String values, double maxSum, java.lang.String algo)
      Get request that takes a comma separated string as a list of values and then breaks them into smaller subsets based whose sum cannot be larger than the provided max sum.

    • Method Detail

      • partition

        @GET
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response partition(@HeaderParam(value="values")
                                                 java.lang.String values,
                                                 @HeaderParam(value="maxSum")
                                                 double maxSum,
                                                 @HeaderParam(value="algo")
                                                 java.lang.String algo)
        Get request that takes a comma separated string as a list of values and then breaks them into smaller subsets based whose sum cannot be larger than the provided max sum. An optional algo can be provided to alter the partitioning algorithm.
        Parameters:
        values - the comma separated list of doubles that will be used to determine the original data set
        maxSum - this is the maximum sum that each subset must be smaller or equal to
        algo - [optional] This is an optional field. You can use this to choose the partition algorithm. Available options are "oneToOne", "greedy", "random", "sortedGreedy" or "reverseSortedGreedy". The default is "greedy"
        Returns:
